Articles.Content:
NOPE

50/50 chance of getting either Sonic Adventure DX or Sonic 06

Hey Mario, got a light? No.

Couldn't resist there.

Ã¢â‚¬â€¹50/50 chance of time travel to 2120/1920.

yes, If i go to 1920 I know the future, and I could make myself rich. If I go to 2120 that would just be awesome in itself(if humans are still around.)

50/50 chance of getting your dream job or working at McDonalds for the rest of your life.

Hey Silver, is it a use if I press this button? No.

You become the coolest guy in the world. But you get an obsession with puppets.

I'm sorry, but I don't want to be the coolest guy in the world. That's not my business.

You can read any book within seconds but you'll die on your 60th birthday.

No sir, I wanna get old. Besides, dying on your birthday is really a bummer

Press teh button for rainbowz, but it will be evil rainbowz.

no, i don't want rainbows

press to live in equestria for a day, but after that day you have to kill every single pony there else existence ceases to be

nope

press for it to be the 22nd but the 2 shows get canceled

I press the button, then MLP:FiM and Annoying Orange (TV Show) get canceled. Heck yes.

Your favorite skill is significantly improved. But you get a ton of annoying fans as a result.

Hmm. Push the button. My favourite skill is a draw between stealth and murder (I am too indecisive, sorry). I don't think that fans will be a problem, kekekekeke.

Push the button to solve any problem in the world, but the person(s) responsible for the existence of the problem die.

wow, nothing bad there. resolve issue, kill the instigator - a perfect combo if i say so myself *press*

Push the button: 50/50 chance of either all forum mods coming to live at your house for the rest of your life or having one ruthless velociraptor live in your house for the rest of your life

Oh ho ho ho, someone has no conception of the idea of "consequences". Sorry, but nothing is so black and white. (might end up destroying all of civilisation if you're not careful)

Yeah, sounds good. *presses*

Push the button for an unlimited supply of food... if you can hold that much food.

Sounds good - I can prove that I can hold an unlimed amount of food by mathematical induction.

Push the button the live forever.

Forever forever - like, when you have read any book there is or will be, thought any thought there can be and tasted every dish there is in the universe, you still have infinity to go

Oh hey, who needs healthcare then? *presses*

Press the button for FTL drives. James Cameron will always be your pilot though.

Edited November 13, 2013 by Deltac
...what the catch though?

I press it anyways FTL or Feel The Light is good both ways!

Press the button to vist the island of Sodor ,but you can never come back ,and confusion ,an delays occur almost everyday.

Nope, never heard of it.

Push button to have unlimited money (without causing inflation) but you can only eat ONE dish of your choice, forever. No other food than the dish of your choice.

I would... you never said how many thing could be on the dish....

push button for food...but it's poisoned... INVISIVE TEXT FTW

Nope it has meat in it.

Go on a adventure on the island of sodor ,but ponified.

Nope..... just.... nope....

Press the button to adventure Middle Earth with Frodo Baggins and his company.

nope... I rather have real food not cookies...

push for ponies... but there ponies...

nah find that place boring.

Press the button to go to the Island of Sodor ,but on troublesome trucks ,and a 8% chance of crashing James.

nope

press for nothing but you become nothing

nah nothing aint go enough.

press this button to get a steam engine ,but you don't have coal ,but wood.

Ill just turn thew ood into charcoal

Press the button for a trip to sodor land. but once you press it, you find out it was a typo, you're actually in sopor land (https://www.google.com/#q=define+sopor)
